scripts.deploy: yarn codegen && yarn graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ in19farkt/akropolis-yearn-router --access-token ${THEGRAPH_ACCESS_TOKEN}
scripts.display-pending-errors: curl --location --request POST 'https://api.thegraph.com/index-node/graphql' --data-raw '{"query":"{ indexingStatusForPendingVersion(subgraphName: \"in19farkt/akropolis-yearn-router\") { subgraph fatalError { message } nonFatalErrors { message } } }"}'
